title: Skaarl is a Riven main
body: He rage quits when he loses too much hp and only comes back when his teammate is doing good.

replies.body: Maiden is an ADC main.  If you leave her alone for less than a minute, they'll wind up dead under the enemy turret.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Kled is also a riven main, goes in no matter what then blames his team for leaving his reckless attack.
Kled and skaarl are the embodiment of so many champions.

Skaarl is a girl, god dammit!!!

Actually, Kled calls Skaarl a he and a she in his dialogue. Riot also confirmed that Kled doesn't know what gender Skaarl is.

Skaarl is in fact a girl.  It says so in Kled's lore.
she doesn't have a dick so...

He only rage quits because he is always abused by his extremely toxic teamate, Kled.
